question: Mu ক্লাস ya P1, abayizi basatu abalina obuzibu bw’ennimi obw’enjawulo (expressive specific language disorder) balina okusoomoozebwa mu nnimi ekikyusa ebiri mu bubaka bwabwe, era kino kiyinza okukosa okwetaba kwabwe n’okuyiga. Omukulu w’essomero atandika okukola ku kiruubirirwa ky’okuyiga ekigamba nti "Okwetaba mu nsonga ezikwata ku biwandiiko ebisomeddwa oba ebiwuliddwa mu ক্লাস oba ku nsonga ezibasikiriza," era olukiiko lw’ekibiina lusalawo okukozesa ensonga ezisikiriza abayizi, nga zitegekeddwa mu bibinja ebitono, era buli kimu ku bino bagattako omuntu okuva mu lukiiko (omukulu w’essomero, omuyambi w’omu ক্লাস, omusomesa omukugu mu by’enjigiriza, omusawo w’eby’emboozi, n’omukugu mu by’endowooza). Nga twekenneereza embeera eno, kiki ku bino ekikwatagana n’enkola enkyukakyuka esobola okukozesebwa okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kw’abayizi?
answer_a: Okay, I understand. Just give me the statements and I will provide the direct corrections in Luganda immediately.
answer_b: Tegeka omulimu mu ngeri etegekeddwa omuntu kinnoomu ng'omusawo omukugu mu by'okwogera ali mu kisenge ky'obuyambi.
answer_c: Gaba ebiwandiiko ebiraga ebifaananyi ebiyambako ng'olabula ku mirimu eginaakolebwa.
answer_d: Kozesa engeri ez’enjawulo ez’okwongera ku lulimi mu biwandiiko by’emikutu gy’emboozi mu bibinja.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Ttiimu y’ekibiina eky’okubiri mu kubala ekola n’ebizimbisizo eby’emisingi emingi, obuyambi bw’ebifaananyi, okuwandiika data ku lubaawo, n’ebibuuzo ebikebera okutegeera okusobola okunyonyola abayizi engeri ennamba okuva ku 0 okutuuka ku 50 gye zikolebwa era ne zisaanuuluzibwa. Oluvannyuma, babakubiriza okutendeka n’okukozesa ebyo bye bayize nga bayita mu kukola omulimu gw’omuyizi kinnoomu era nga beekolera. Mu kulondoola omulimu ogwo, kizuulwa nti abayizi abamu bazibuwalirwa okukola omulimu gw’omuyizi, newankubadde nga baaddamu bulungi ebibuuzo ebibaddewo mu kunnyonnyola ebyo bye bayize. Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, kiki ekireetera abayizi okulemererwa okuyiga n’okwetaba mu mulimu?
answer_a: Obutabaawo mbeera ennungamu era eyabulijjo abayizi mwe bayinza okuyigira.
answer_b: Obutabaawo ngeri nnyingi z’okukozesa okwetegereza n’okuwa abayizi endowooza ku bye bakoze mu musomo.
answer_c: Obutabaawo bintu biyinza kuyambako mu kukulaakulanya omulimu gw'okukozesa ebyo omuntu by'ayize, okusinziira ku mutendera gw'obumanyi abayizi bwe balina.
answer_d: Obutabaawo nteekateeka ya kukolagana ng'abayizi basomesebwa abasomesa babiri omulundi gumu eteekateeka eyo nga tenneekenneenya ngeri abayizi gye bayigaamu nga tebannaba kuyiga, nga bayiga, ne bwe bamaze okuyiga.

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu kibiina eky’omwaka ogusooka, okuyita mu byuma bya kompyuta, ebigambo ebitandika ne BL ne BR bikolebwako. Omu ku mirimu egitegekeddwa okutandika ekibiina kwe kulaba ebifaananyi ebiraga ebintu ebyenjawulo, amannya gaabyo agalina akakwate ku bigambo ebyo, okunyiga ku bintu ebyo okuwulira amannya gaabyo ate oluvannyuma ne babigabanya mu bibinja by’ennukuta ezo. Oluvannyuma, bakola okunoonyereza n’okugatta ekigambo awamu n’omusomesa. Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, nkola ki ey’obwongo esinga mu mulimu ogwo ogusooka?
answer_a: Okujjukira ebifaananyi
answer_b: Okutegeera ebigambo nga bwe bitondekebwa mu bitundu (Syllables)
answer_c: Okumanya engeri amannya g'ebigambo gye gakolebwamu.
answer_d: Okutondeesa obubonero obulabika

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Mu kukebera omuyizi ow’omu mwaka ogw’okusatu okumanya obusobozi bwe mu by’okusoma n’okumanya oba asaanira okuyingizibwa mu pulogulaamu y’abayizi abalina obwetaavu obw’enjawulo, akakiiko k’ekibiina ky’abayizi kaatunuulira ebimukwatako ng’omuyizi, nga mw’otwalidde ebyo bye yayitamu mu ssomero n’engeri gye yayigamu, nga mw’otwalidde n’ebyo bye yaddamu n’ebipimo eby’enjawulo ebitali bya basawo bye yakolebwa. Okwongerezaako, akakiiko kaatunuulira engeri omuyizi gy’ali, gamba ng’obuswavu, obuzibu mu kukwata ebintu mu mutwe, n’obutabaako ky’annyonnyola mu masomo. Ku bino ebiri wammanga, kiki akakiiko k’ekibiina ky’abayizi kye kirina okutekako essira okusobola okufuna ebimukwatako ebimuyamba?
answer_a: Pima ebikolwa byabwe eby'obuntu.
answer_b: Saba okwekebejebwa obulamu.
answer_c: Kebera obusobozi bwabwe okutegeera n'okulambika ebintu.
answer_d: Kukola okunoonyereza ku ndwadde z'omuntu n'ab'omu maka ge.

question: Soma embeera eno: Ttiimu y’ekibiina ky’omukaaga, olw’obwenzi obutono mu masomo, esalawo okukozesa tulakadi ez’omuntu kinnoomu buli omu asobole okuddamu okusoomoozebwa okumala ebiseera ebimu mu kibiina. Kino kijja kusobozesa okumanya omutendera gw’okuyiga kwabwe ku bukugu oba ebiri mu somo ebitongojjebwa era kiyambe okukola ebyetaagisa okumalawo obuzibu. Ku luuyi olulala, abakugu mu ttiimu y’ekibiina bajja kusobola okukung’aanya amawulire agakwata ku muyizi okukebera obanga alina obuzibu bwonna mu kuyiga. Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, nkola ki ey’okukebera ttiimu y’ekibiina gy’esazeewo okukozesa?
answer_a: Okwekebejja okuyamba omuyizi okutereera
answer_b: Okukebera okw'amakkati
answer_c: Okukebera okuzuula obuzibu
answer_d: Okuteebereza okugattira awamu

question: Soma embeera eno: Francisco, omuyizi ow'omu mwaka ogw'omukaaga ng'alina obuzibu mu kubala (calculus), asangiddwa n'ekibuuzo kino kya math: Mu famire erimu omuli ab'oluganda basatu, Carlos ye muto, Pedro ye wakati, ate Jorge ye mukulu. Pedro alina emyaka ebiri egya Carlos, ate Jorge alina emyaka esatu egya Carlos. Ab'oluganda abo basatu balina myaka mingi ki? Kirage mu ngeri y'ekibalangulo (algebraically). Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ekibuuzo ekyo, omuyizi azzeemu bwati: "X + 2 + 3". Nga tutunuulidde ebyo waggulu, buzibu ki obw'okuyiga obulagiddwa Francisco?
answer_a: Okumanya obulungi engeri ezikozesebwa mu kubala aligebra.
answer_b: Okukiikirira embeera entuufu nga tukozesa olulimi lw'ekibalangulo
answer_c: Okutegeera okusoma okuli wansi w’okukola ebibazo by’aligebra
answer_d: Okusunsula ebimanyisiddwa ebikwatagana n'okugonjoola ebizibu by'ekibalangulo

question: Soma embeera eno: Ttiimu y’ekibiina ky’okusatu mu somo ly’Olulimi n’Empuliziganya ekola omulimu okunyweza okutegeera ebiwandiiko mu bawala n’abalenzi, naddala abo abalina obuzibu mu kusoma. Omulimu guno gwe gwa kulonda ebiwandiiko by’olugero era nga tebannabisoma, bagabane mu bibinja eby’emirimu eby’enjawulo eby’okuddamu ebibuuzo bino: - Lwaki nnonda ebiwandiiko bino? - Nnina mulimu ki okusoma ebiwandiiko bino? - Kiki kye nnoonya bwe mba njagala okumanya ebiwandiiko bye nnonda bye biribaako? - Okusinziira ku kibuuzo ekikulembedde, ebiwandiiko bye nnonda biribaako ki? Kiki ku bino wammanga ekisinziira ku nkola omusomesa omukugu mu by’enjigiriza enjawulo gy’akozesezza abayizi nga tebannasoma biwandiiko bye balondedde?
answer_a: Ewa amakulu mu kusoma, ng’ekozesa okumanya n’obumanyirivu abayizi bwe balina.
answer_b: Kuyamba abayizi okusoma nga balina ekigendererwa ekitali kyangu era n'okukola ebirowoozo ku byebagenda okusoma
answer_c: Enyanguyiza abayizi okutegeera ebikulu ebiri mu mutindo gw'ebyawandiikidwa n'okuwa amakulu mu kusoma.
answer_d: Kisobozesa abayizi okukola ebyo bye balowooza nga basinziira ku bye basoma era kiyamba okukulaakulanya endowooza.

question: Soma embeera eno: Ku ntandikwa y’omwaka, akabinja k’abayizi abali mu kibiina eky’okubiri bagenda kukola omulimu gw’okuzuula obumanyirivu bw’abayizi mu kusoma n’okuwandiika. Okukola kino, balowooza okukozesa ennyimba. Amawulire ge balina ku kibiina kwe kuba nti waliwo abayizi abazuuliddwa nga balina obulemu mu kusoma, abamu ku bo balaga nti tebamanyi kusoma wadde okuwandiika, n’abalala abalaga nti tebaagala kusoma. Okwongerezaako, okusinziira ku mawulire agaaweereddwa omusomesa omukugu mu by’enjigiriza ey’enjawulo, enkola y’obumanyirivu eyakozesebwa omwaka oguwedde teyaleeta nkulaakulana eyali esuubirwa. Nkola ki etuukirawo okukwataganya embeera y’okuyiga eno?
answer_a: Musome era muyimbe oluyimba wamu n'abayizi balyoke bawandiike ebitundu byabwe bye baagala ennyo nga bakozesa ennukuta ezisengekebwa.
answer_b: Kozesa ebibuuzo ebibakulembera abayizi basobole okusala n'okutegeka obutundutundu bw'amannya g'ennyimba ezitali zimu.
answer_c: Laga olunyiriri lw'oluyimba olusanyusa abayizi balukoppe mu biwandiiko byabwe, balambike ekitundu kye basinga okwagala mu lwo, era baluyimbe.
answer_d: Mulonde era musimbeko olukoloboze wamu n'abayizi, akasirikale akasembyayo mu mutwe gw'ennyimba ez'enjawulo basobole okwawula okufaanagana n'enjawulo wakati waazo.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Ttiimu y’ekibiina ky’abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw’olubereberye mu somero ly’omutendera ogwa waggulu abasoma Olulimi n’Obuwangwa bateekateeka okukolera awamu n’abayizi okutegeera ekitundu ky’ekitabo, nga bakozesa amaanyi mangi okunyonyola engeri ekifo gye kikosa emboozi. Omusomesa omukugu mu bayizi abetaaga obuyambi obw’enjawulo alaga nti abayizi, nga mw’otwalidde n’abo abalina obulemu mu kusoma, balaga obwetaavu bw’obuyambi okusobola okutegeera omukwano oguli wakati w’ekifo n’ekikolwa, kale n’asaba okukola ebikolwa ebisooka ebyangu okusobola okutuukiriza ekigendererwa. Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, nkola ki esaanidde okukozesebwa okuddamu eri embeera y’abayizi ey’okuyiga?
answer_a: Soma emboozi okuzuula omuzira omukulu, londawo ebanga n’embeera ebamwetoolodde, tegeera ebibaleetera okukola ekyo, era olonde ebipimo by’enneewulira zaabwe.
answer_b: Kola n’essuula y’ekitabo kye bagenda okusoma okutegeka ebikolwa by’abazannyi abakulu n’ebifaananyi era okutegeera ebibatuukako, ebifo we bibeera, n’abalumwa.
answer_c: Tegeka amakulu agali mu kigendererwa eky’okutuukibwako okusobola okutegeera ekifo eky’ebyogerero n’ebikolwa by’abantu abalimu, era okutegeera embeera, obudde, obuntu, ekifo ky’ebirowoozo, n’ebikolwa.
answer_d: Londaamu ebitundu okuva mu katabo akalimu ebifaananyi okusobola okuteebereza abantu abaliko kye bakola, we bali, era n’okutegeera engeri gye bawuliramu, ng’osinziira ku biwandiike ebiri n’ekifaananyi, endowooza z’abantu abaliko, n’ebintu ebirala ebiriwo.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Abayizi abamu mu kibiina eky’okuna, nga mw’otwalidde n’abo abalina obuzibu mu kusoma, basobola okuddamu ebibuuzo byokka eby’okutegeera ebikwata ku bukugu obw’omutendera ogusooka. Okwongera ku nkulaakulana yaabwe mu by’okusoma n’okubasobozesa okukulaakulanya okutegeera ebikugu ebya waggulu, ttiimu y’omu kibiina ekolera wamu n’enkola nga zino wammanga ku ntandikwa y’ebibiina: Embeera eragiddwa ku lubaawo (ng’eri wamu n’ebifaananyi) Guido yassa obuwunga mu kibya n’agattako baking powder. Mu kintu ekirala, yatabula sukaali ne majjalini n’amagi. Bwe yamala okutabula ebiri mu bintu byombi, yagattako amata n’agenda mu maaso n’okukuba. Ekibuuzo eri abayizi Guido akola ki? Bubuu bumatirivu ki okuva mu kiwandiiko obukusobozesa okukiraga? Wakozesezza ki okutuuka ku ky’okuddamu? Lwaki ttiimu y’omu kibiina ekikozesa enkola eno n’abayizi?
answer_a: Basobole okutegeera ebikulu, okugeraageranya eby'amaanyi, n'okubigabanya mu bibinja okusinziira ku bukulu bwabyo.
answer_b: basobole okutegeera ebikulu, okubikwataganya, okubigatta ku bye baamaze okuyiga, n’okuvaamu eky’amugaso.
answer_c: Basobole okwawula ensonga enkulu, okuzitegeka mu ngeri entuufu, okuzikwataganya n’ebirimu, n’okuteebereza.
answer_d: Basobole okunoonya amawulire agatereke, okugeraageranya n'ebiwandiiko ebirala ebifaanagana, okugatta ku muntu(bantu), n'okulambika amakulu g'ekiwandiiko kyonna.

question: Soma embeera eno: Leonor ali mu kibiina kyakusatu era alina obulemu mu kusoma. Okusobola okusoma nga bulijjo, omuyizi ono yeetaaga okwenyigira ennyo n’okufumiitiriza ku kuyiga okusoma n’okuwandiika. Okuva bwe kiri nti enkola ezisinziira ku mutindo gw’obumanyirivu tezinnavaamu bigendererwa, omusomesa omukugu mu by’enjigiriza entegeke ateekateeka enkola endala ezitunuulira engeri omuwala gy’ali. Ng’ekyokulabirako, obwetwaze bwe n’okwagala kwe okuyigira ku bikozesebwa ebirabika. Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, nkola ki etuukirawo okukozesa ne Leonor?
answer_a: Tegeera akatundu akasooka okuva mu lukalala lw'amannya okumukubiriza okuwandiika akatundu ako n'okukola ebigambo ebyesigamiziddwa ku kyo
answer_b: Laba katuni ez’enjawulo okumusindikiriza okulonda ekifananyi ky’asinga okwagala era okikubise mu buwandiisi mu ndabika n’enneeyisa.
answer_c: Kebera ebitabo ebikulu eby’enjawulo okumukubiriza okunoonyereza n’okuwandiika enfumo (infographic) ekwata ku mawulire agali mu byo, ng’otunuulira okuteekateeka, okuwandiika, okukolola, n’okusaasaanya ebiwandiiko.
answer_d: Soma ekigambo era olonde ennyingo ezitali nnume okumusindika okuzimba ebigambo eby’enjawulo nabyo, nga olowooza nti yeetaaga okutegeera eddoboozi lyabyo n’okubikwata mu mutwe ng’ayambibwa ebifaananyi.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Omusomesa omukugu mu kuyamba abaana abalina obuzibu mu kusoma akola ebigezo ebya Piaget okukebera omuyizi ow’omu mwaka ogw’okubiri ayinza okuba ng’alina obuzibu mu kubala. Okusinziira ku bigezo ebyakozesebwa eby’omutwe gw’ekigambo "okukozesa ebipimo", omusomesa akkiriza nti omuyizi alina obwetaavu bw’okuyambibwa mu kukwata amateeka agakozesebwa mu kigezo ekyo. Mu nkola zino wammanga, y’ennu y’erina okukozesebwa okuyamba omuyizi mu mbeera eyo waggulu?
answer_a: Waayo kaadi eziriko ebifaananyi ebiraga ebikolwa ebiddiriŋŋana omuyizi by’ateekateeka okusinziira ku ngeri ez’enjawulo.
answer_b: Yamba omuyizi okukola olutaanu lw'ennamba ng'okozesa ebifaananyi okusobola okumuyamba okutegeera ebifanana n'ebitafanana.
answer_c: Kozesa kaadi omuyizi okukola okubala kungi bw'ebintu era okoseze ebiragiro "ebisinga ku ki" ne "ebitasinga ku ki"
answer_d: Kozesa kaadi eziriko ennamba n’emitayimbwa gy’omuceere omwana asobole okukola omukwatagana ogwa “omu ku omu” okusinziira ku bungi obulagiddwa.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Mu masomero g'ekibalo eky'ekibiina eky'okusatu, akabinja k'ekibiina kakolera wamu n'abayizi ku nkola ezitegeka engeri emikutu gy'emirimu gy'ekibalo gye gitambuzibwamu. Bwe bali mu kulondoola omulimu ogumu, bakizuula nti Renata, omuyizi alina obuzibu mu kubala, yeetaaga obuyambi mu kutegeera n'okubala mu bwongo okugatta ennamba eziri okumpi n'ekkumi, gamba nga bw'akola ebibuuzo nga 26+9 oba 54+28. Nga tweyambisa ebyo waggulu, nkola ki esobola okuddamu eri obwetaavu bw'obuyambi omuyizi bw'alaga?
answer_a: Kuba obubalanguzi obw’okukoppa omuwendo gw’ebintu, ng’okozesa engeri z’okwekebejja namba.
answer_b: Laga omuwendo ogw'ekifo buli namba gw'etuulamu, okubajja n'okwawula namba.
answer_c: Nyweza omulamwa gw'ekikyusizo n'omugattiko mu kubala, ng'okola dduyiro ku nteekateeka y'ennamba ezigattibwa.
answer_d: Maliriza ennyingo z’omuwendo zigenda zigulumira n’ezikka, ng’ojjuzaamu ebitaliwo okusobola okugaziya obusobozi bwe ku miwendo.

question: Soma embeera eno: Ttiimu y’ekibiina ky’abaana abali mu mwaka ogw’okubiri yakolera wamu n’ekibiina ku kiruubirirwa kino: Okuwandiika n’okwawulaawula ennamba okuva ku 0 okutuuka ku 100 mu ngeri ey’okugatta, mu ngeri entuufu, ey’ebifaananyi, n’ey’akabonero. Mu kiseera ekimu nga bayigiriza, ttiimu yakizuula nti obwetaavu obusinga obw’abayizi abamu bwali bwa butamanya nti obumu 11 bwe bumu ne kkumi 1 n’obumu 1. Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, nkola ki esinziira ku kukozesa ebikozesebwa mu kusomesa esaanira okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa kino?
answer_a: Nyweza omulamwa gw'okugatta nga tukozesa okukyusa omuwendo, ng'okozesa ennyingo z'omuwendo n'ekibalangulo.
answer_b: Yeezenga omulamwa gw’okukungaanya n’okukungulula, ng’okozesa ebikondo ekkumi n’omukono.
answer_c: Yeezenga okugatta okwangu, ng’okozesa obuwunga obwa langi n’emirongo gy’ennamba.
answer_d: Yeezenga okutegeka ennamba mu nteekateeka eyekulukuta n’eyekkaanya, ng’okozesa ddeke y’ebbaati eriko ennamba okutuuka ku

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Sebastian muyizi wa kibiina kyakusatu, olw'ensonga z'obulamu, tabeerawo bulijjo ku ssomero. Kino kireetera okukulaakulana kwe mu by'okusoma okuba nga kuli wansi okw'abo b'ali nabo mu kibiina. Ng'ekyokulabirako, mu somo ly'Ekibalangulo bakola ku kwongereza ennamba ezitaliimu bitundu nga zirina omuwendo ogutafaanana. Wabula, omuyizi tannaba kunnyikiza kutegeera kwe ku nnamba ezitaliimu bitundu n'engeri gye zikolamu, ng'alaga obwetaavu bw'obuyambi mu kutegeka ennamba okusinziira ku muwendo gwazo mu kifo mwe ziri era ne mu kukolagana n'okugattika. Ku nkola zino wammanga, nzi eyamba okukola ku bwetaavu bw'obuyambi bwa Sebastian?
answer_a: Okukozesa omulingo gwa "flipped classroom", soma namba nga okoleesa kaadi era okikiririre n'okwawulaawula ennamba nga okoleesa ebikondo eby'emitendera egiwerako okunyweza okuyiga, nga okoleesa akabaadi akalaga ekifo ky'ennamba.
answer_b: Kozesa omutindo gw'okuzannya emizannyo, yega okugatta ennamba ez'obutonde nga okokozesa obubaati obw'emizannyo era okoleesa data okunyweza okwetaba kwe, okuyita mu kusoomoozebwa okweyongera obuzibu.
answer_c: Kozesa omulembe gw'okukola ogwesigamiziddwa ku pulojekiti n'enkola z'okugonjoola ebizibu, ng'okozesa ebikondo eby'emitendera emingi n'emmeeza z'ennamba okukiikirira omuwendo ogw'okugattako n'okugigeraageranya ku kaadi ez'ebifaananyi.
answer_d: Kozesa omutindo gw'ebifo by'okusomera n'ebizibu ebya bulijjo, wamu n'ebizimbe ebirongoofu n'enkondo za Cuisenaire, okunyweza endowooza z'okugenda mu maaso, okugatta, n'okugattika, mu bimu ku byo.

question: Soma embeera eno: Akakiiko akakulira essomero ly'ebyemikono, wamu n'omusomesa w'abayizi abalina obwetaavu obw'enjawulo, bakiraba nti abayizi batera okuba abagayaavu era nga "beesigama ku musomesa" mu bifo omukolerwa omulimu. Kino kirabika ne mu bifo gye batwalibwa okukolerayo omulimu, kubanga okwesobola kiba kintu ekibalemesa. Okusinziira ku kino, nkola ki eyamba abayizi mu mbeera eno?
answer_a: Teekawo enkola za bulijjo mu kibiina n'enkola ezibategeeza ebintu ebigenda okubaawo, basobole okuteebereza emirimu oba ebikorwa bye bagenda okukola mu mitendera gy'okubangulwa.
answer_b: Okukwasaganya enkulaakulana y'omulimu gwa pulojekiti, basobole okwetaba mu kuteekateeka emirimu n'ebiruubirirwa eby'okukwatwako mu misomo.
answer_c: Kukubiriza okwekebejja ebiri mu nteekateeka n'ebikolebwa mu misomo gy'okutendekebwa, basobole okwenyigira mu bikolebwa eby'omugaso.
answer_d: Enjawulo ku mitendera gy’obuzibu n’omutindo gw’ebyetaagisa mu bikolebwa mu makolero okwongera okwagala kwabwe mu nkola y’emirimu.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Mu kibiina ky’abana mu ssomero erito, mu somo ly’Ebyafaayo, Jjogolaafiya, n’Ensonga z’Obutonde, bakola ku kigendererwa "okunnyonnyola engeri Amerika ne Chile gye zyawambibwaamu, nga mw’otwalidde abantu abaakikola, olutalo olumu, n’obukakafu bw’amagye." Mu kiseera ky’okukola emirimu, ttiimu y’ekibiina ekirabye nti abayizi abamu, nga mw’otwalidde abo abalina obuzibu mu kusoma, newankubadde baddamu ebibuuzo mu kamwa, beetaaga obuyambi mu kukwata ebintu ebikulu okuva mu byafaayo, beerabira ebintu ebyaliwo mangu, era tebalina busobozi bungi mu nteekateeka zaabwe ez’okusoma. Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, nkola ki esobola okukola ku bwetaavu bw’abayizi?
answer_a: Gattikaanya amawulire mu bitundu ebitono era oleese ebyo ebiri mu mutwe kinaddimu.
answer_b: Waayo obubonero oba obulagirizi okusobola okutereeza n'okutegeka ebintu oba engeri ebintu gye bikolebwamu ebikwata ku ebyo ebiri mu mulamwa.
answer_c: Kozesa obukodyo obw'okukwata ebigambo n'obuyambi obw'ebifaananyi okwanguya okukwata ebinuulo mu kukola ku mawulire.
answer_d: Kola ebibuuzo by’okwetereeza oba obubuuzo obutonotono okusobola okufumiitiriza ku mulimu ogukoleddwa nga osinziira ku biri mu by’osoma.

question: Soma embeera eno: Ttiimu y’ekibiina ey’eby’emabega, eby’obutonde, n’ebyobufuzi ey’ekibiina eky’okuna etegekanya omukolo ogutandika okukola ku kiruubirirwa ky’okuyiga "okuzuula ebifo ku maapu nga tukozesa ennyingo z’ebifo (emisalaba n’emirongo)". Okukola kino, balina okutunuulira empisa z’ekibiina zino: - Abayizi 20. - Okubaawo abayizi abalina obulemu bwa ADHD n’obulemu bw’okuyiga. - Beetaba nnyo mu bikolwa ebirina omugaso. - Bafiirwa essira nga bakola ku biwandiiko n’ennyanjula ez’omumwa. Okusinziira ku mpisa z’ekibiina ezinyonnyoddwa, nkola ki etuufu okutandika okukola n’ekiruubirirwa ky’okuyiga ekiragiddwa?
answer_a: Kozesa ekitabo ekinene eky’ebifaananyi n’abayizi, gamba ng’ekifaananyi ky’ensi yonna, basobole okunoonya amawanga ag’enjawulo ku kyo, kibasobozese okumanya ebifo byago we biraga ku maapu.
answer_b: Zannya emizannyo gy'oku kaadi n'abayizi, gamba nga, olutalo lw'amaato, basobole okuzuula ebifananyi ku lukalala lw'ebifo, kibayambe okunoonyereza ku biri mu ssomo nga tebannalitegeera bulungi.
answer_c: Kozesa ebintu bya pulasitiika ng'omupiira, abayizi basobole okukuba olukoloboze olugalamivu n'olugolokofu okukirako, nga kibasobozesa okuzuula omugaso gwabyo ku ttaka ly'ensi.
answer_d: Zannya n'abayizi okuzuula amawanga, okugeza, ku guloobu, balyoke bamanye omukutu gw'ensi n'olunyiriri lwa Greenwich, kibayambe okutegeera endowooza zino ng'ebifo eby'okutandikirako.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Omusomesa ow'ekibiina eky'okutaano akola ku kumanya ebyo omuntu by'asoma, okusingira ddala, ekigendererwa "Okwongera okutegeera nga tonnasoma kiwandiiko." Mu kibiina, mulimu omuyizi omu kiggala ayogera okuyita mu lulimi lw'ebikopo era ng'alina obuzibu mu kwongera n'okutuukiriza ebigambo. Omusomesa amanya ensibuko y'obuzibu buno mu buzibu obuliwo mu kukwataganya akabonero n'amakulu mu ngeri entuufu. Nga twekenneereza embeera eyo waggulu, ku bino wammanga, kiki ekiraga engeri esinga okuba entuufu ey'okwanguyiriza okutuukiriza ekigendererwa n'omuyizi alina obulemu bw'okuwulira?
answer_a: Longoosa omulamwa nga okola olulimi olukwatagana n’embeera omuyizi gy’akoleramu.
answer_b: Muwe eby’okusoma nga tebunnabaawo asobole okubisoma awaka nga tannaba kusoma mu kibiina.
answer_c:
Omutwe gw'ekigambo kino kwe kuvumbula ebikulu ebikwata ku byenfuna. Mu kigambo kino, tujja kwetegereza amakulu g'ebigambo ebimu nga bwe bikozesebwa mu byenfuna.

*   **Enfuna:** Eno kitegeeza engeri abantu gye bafunamu ssente oba eby'obugagga ebirala.
*   **Okukozesa:** Kino kitegeeza engeri abantu gye bakozesaamu ssente zaabwe okugula ebintu bye beetaaga oba okubikka ku byetaago byabwe.
*   **Okutunda:** Kino kitegeeza okuwa omuntu ekintu kyo n'omuwa ssente zo.
*   **Obutabaawo bwa ssente:** Kino kitegeeza embeera y'okubula kw'ensimbi ezimala okukola ebintu bye twetaaga.
answer_d: Muwe omukutu gw'ebigambo by'olina okunoonyereza amakulu gaabyo mu dictionary nga tonnatandika kusoma mu class.

question: Soma ekiteeso kino wammanga: "Balina obulemu obwamaanyi mu ngeri obwongo bwabwe gye bukola n'enneeyisa yaabwe, nga kino kyeleererwa mu bukugu bwabwe obw'okutegeera, okukolagana n'abantu, n'obukugu obw'omugaso mu bulamu obwa bulijjo. Kino kitandika nga omuntu tannaba kukwata myaka 18" (AAIDD, 2011, olup. 25). AAIDD (2011). Obulemu bw'Obwongo. Ekiteeso, Ebibinja, n'Enkola ez'Okuwagira Abantu. Alianza Editorial. Ku ngeri zino wammanga, engeri ki ekwatagana n'ekiteeso ekiri waggulu?
answer_a: Enjawulo mu nkola y'ebintu
answer_b: Obulemu bw’ebirowoozo
answer_c: Omulamwa gw'obwongo
answer_d: Obuzibu bw'endwadde y'obwongo ekiyitibwa Autism Spectrum Disorder

question: Soma embeera eno: Jose muyizi alina obulemu era ali mu kibiina kya 4 mu ssomero erisomesa bonna nga bamuyambako, yeenyigira nnyo mu kibiina era mu kubala asobola okukola ebibazo by'ennamba wakati wa 1-20, ng'akozesa ebintu ebirabika. Kati, ttiimu y'ekibiina eri ku mulimu gw'okuyiga "okulaga okutegeera ebitundu nga byawuddwamu 12, 10, 8, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2" era baagala okukebera oba Jose ategeera omulimu guno. Okutunuulira embeera eyo waggulu, nkola ki ey'okukebera esobola okumanyisa oba Jose atuuse ku mutindo gw'okuyiga ogwo?
answer_a: Okukuba langi ebifaananyi by’ebicweka ebikubiddwa mu ndabika ez’enjawulo ez’ekibalangulo ezikwatagana n’ekintu ekijjuvu n’ekicweka ekyawuddwaamu
answer_b: Okuddamu omubuuzo ogw'obulagirizi mu bibinja abayizi webategeka kaadi ezikikirira ebitundu ku lukalo lw'ennamba olukozesebwa.
answer_c: Okukuba langi omuwendo gw’ebitundu by’omugaati gw’amazaalibwa ogukiikirira omukutule ogulagiddwa mu mulamwa gw’emirimu oguweereddwa ttiimu y’ekibiina.
answer_d: Okutondawo ekibinja ky'abantu 12 n'okuwa Jose piza y'omuzannyo gy'alina okugabanya mu bitundu ebyenkanankana okugabana ne banne mu kibiina.

question: Mu nkola zino wammanga, y’eri etuukana n’okukulaakulanya obusobozi bw’omuyizi ow’ekibiina ekisooka aliko obulemu, obw’okuteekateeka ebintu mu mbeera y’ekibiina?
answer_a: Saba omuyizi akole ebintu ebyo kwejjulula ebiraga engeri gy’ebikolwa bye bwe bikosa ebintu ebirala.
answer_b: Wa wano we wetaaga okuteekawo emirimu egikubiriza omuyizi okusalawo okuyita mu bibuuzo eby'ekiggwo ebitaliiko bukomo.
answer_c: Teekawo emirimu gy’okukakasa omuyizi mw’akakasa ekintu ekikoleddwa n’agenda mu maaso mu ngeri entengejje.
answer_d: Teekawo emirimu mu biseera ebyeyongera, omuyizi mw’alina okukoppa ebimuweereddwa okusobola okutuuka ku kiruubirirwa.

question: Soma embeera eno: Sofia alina emyaka ekkumi, ali mu kibiina kyakusatu, era alina obulemu mu kusoma. Mu kubala, akola ebikunizo ebiwandiike nga ayambibwa ebifaananyi era ategeera emisingi gy'ekibalangulo, ng'alaga obwetaavu bw'okuyambibwa mu kuwandiika akabonero k'ekibalangulo. Omusomesa we omukulu akolera mu kibiina ku bukugu bw'okugonjoola ebizibu by'okugatta n'okwawuza. Okusinziira ku bubaka buno, ku bikolwa by'obusomesa bino wammanga kiki ekikulaakulanya obukugu bw'okugonjoola ebizibu by'ekibalangulo?
answer_a: Muwabule abayizi okuteesa embeera mwe bayinza okutondekerawo ebizibu by'ekibalangulo.
answer_b: Kkaatiriza n'abayizi ebikolwa n'ebivaamu by'ebibuuzo by'ekibalangulo ebyakolebwa edda.
answer_c: Gaba mannyaazi mu bibinja by'abayizi bana bana, abasaanidde okukola ebyo byonna ebyetaagisa n'okuwandiika ebyavaamu ku lubaawo.
answer_d: Mukkirize engeri ez'enjawulo abayizi ze bayinza okukozesa okwogera ku ngeri gye bakozesezza okugonjoola ekibuuzo ky'ekibalangulo.

question: Soma embeera eno: Omusomesa w'ekibiina eky'okubiri ayagala okukulaakulanya obusobozi bw'abayizi be okutegeera ebyo basoma ng'ayitira mu ngero ezisomwa omuntu omukulu. Mu kibiina mwe muli Sofia, omuyizi alina obulemu bwa Down syndrome. Olulimi lwa Sofia lutegeerekeka; alina okutegeera okw'amaanyi okw'ebigambo ebimpi naye ngawoleka obuzibu mu kukora kw'obwongo bwe. Mu nkola zino wammanga, y'ennu y'erambika butereevu okuyamba Sofia okukora kw'obwongo bwe okukwatagana n'okutegeera by'asoma?
answer_a: Okuwuliriza olugero olumanyiddwa nga lukyusiddwa, abayizi baluwandiike obutuufu era bawa obubaka obutuufu obukukwatagana nalwo.
answer_b: Okuddamu ebibuuzo ebikwata ku kawungeezi akampi era n'okuddamu nga bayita mu kukuba ekifaananyi, abayizi basobole okwoleka bye bategeera.
answer_c: Okuwa endowooza ku balina obuntu mu bifaananyi n'embeera eziragiddwa okukwataganya ebiri mu kifaananyi n'ebyo abayizi bye bayitamu.
answer_d: Okukuba ekifaananyi ky’ekikwaso ky’ekitabo eky’ebyongerezo ekyasomeddwa awaka, okukulaakulanya obusobozi bw’ekibiina okutegeera ebiri mu mutwe gw’ekitabo.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Romina muyizi alina obulemu bw’obwongo era nga yegatta ku lukiko lw’ebyemikono. Alaga omutindo gw’okulowooza ogwa nkukunala era nga yeeyoleka mu mpisa ezitali za mateeka. Omusomesa omukugu ow’abayizi abalina obulemu asalawo okuyamba omuyizi ono mu nkola y’okuteekateeka emirimu gy’asoma ng’akozesa enkola ya ‘mutendera ku mutendera’ mu kiseera ky’okukola emirimu. Nga twetegerezza embeera eyo waggulu, lwaki enkola eyo ey’okusomesa eyogeddwa waggulu eyamba omuyizi okuyiga?
answer_a: Kiyamba okutandikawo emikwano n'okukulaakulanya endowooza ennyingirivu.
answer_b: Kyongera amaanyi ku kwetikka n'okussa essira ku bintu by'essomero n'awaka
answer_c: Kigattako okukwasaganya empisa, okwongera okwetereeza kw’empisa ze.
answer_d: Kigenderera mu bikolwa ebikulu mu ngeri entuufu okukendeeza ku mpisa ezitali za kufumiitirizaako.

question: Soma embeera eno: Agustan ali mu kibiina kya 5 era alina ekirwadde ky’obwongo. Asobola okutegeera ebyo abakulu n’abantu ab’emikwano gye bye boogera, era ayoleka okwagala okwogera. Kyokka, obwetaavu bwe obusinga obw’obuyambi bukwaatagana n’okwogera okutegeerekeka. Nga twekenneereza ku mbeera ya Agusta­n, ku bikolwa by’ebyenjigiriza bino wammanga kiki ekisaana okukozesebwa okukwasaganya obwetaavu bwe obw’obuyambi?
answer_a: Kubiriza okwogera nga oyambibwa ebifaananyi
answer_b: Okugattako okunnyonnyola ebirowoozo n'ebigambo, kozesa obubonero bw'ebifaananyi.
answer_c: Wagira okwogera nga weekozesa ebintu eby'omugaso.
answer_d: Gaggawaza ennyanjula y'ebigambo nga oyambibwa ekifaananyi ky'ekintu ekituufu

question: Soma embeera eno: Vicente muyizi alina obulemu bw’obwongo ali mu kibiina ekisooka era nga yeetaaga obuyambi mu kutegeera olulimi, gamba nga, bw’aba akoona ebiragiro ebyangu ebiweereddwa mu bigambo, okuddamu ebibuuzo, n’okutegeera ebiwandiiko ebisomeddwa omuntu omulala. Ku bikolwa by’abayigiriza bino wammanga, kiki ekiwagira enkulaakulana y’okutegeera empuliziganya ey’omumwa mu muyizi oyo?
answer_a: Yongera ku bwangu bw'okuddamu.
answer_b: Goberera ebiragiro ebino nga bitundu.
answer_c: Ggambira okukyusa empandiika okusobola okutegeerekeka obulungi
answer_d: Yongera ku bubaka ng'okozesa obubonero obulabika.

question: Soma embeera eno: Juan muyizi alina obulemu bw’obwongo mu kibiina ekisooka mu ssomero ly’abayizi abalina obwetaavu obw’enjawulo. Mu kibiina, alagibwa okuba omwetegefu era nga musanyufu okuyiga; wabula, ebyo by’ayogera tebitegeerekeka eri abo abatamumanyi bulungi. Atega amatu ku bifaananyi era atandise okusoma. Omusomesa alowooza nti kyetaagisa okwongera ku byo omuyizi by’ayogera okumuwa engeri z’okuddamu ebikolebwa. Nga tweyambisa amawulire gano, kintu ki kya tekinologiya kiyamba okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyateekebwawo eri omuyizi?
answer_a: Pulogulaamu erimu ebifaananyi ebiraga ebintu n’ebifaananyi ebikozesebwa okuteekateeka ebbaati z’okwogererako, Gamba ndeke njogere
answer_b: Enkola y'ekikozesebwa ku kompyuta ekusobozesa okuwandiika ebiwandiiko n'obubonero mu kiseera kye kimu, Araword
answer_c: Pulogulaamu erimu okuyambako okusoma n'okuwandiika awaka, Okuyiga okusoma ne Bartolo
answer_d: Pulogulaamu ekolera ku bukugu bw’ennimi obw’enjawulo (okusoma, okuwandiika, n’okwogera), Leo Primero

question: Soma embeera eno: Paz muyizi wa myaka ena alina obulemu bw’obwongo era ali mu ssomero ly’abaana abato eririna obuyambi bw’eby’enjigiriza ebyenjawulo. Ayoleka obusobozi obw’amaanyi okujjukira ebintu by’alaba, kubanga ajjukira ebifaananyi bingi, akabonero, n’obubonero obulala, era alina enkulaakulana y’emibiri egigyaana emyaka gye. Omusomesa w’abaana abato, awamu n’omusomesa omukugu, bateekateeka omulimu ogukwata ku kikulu ekya buntu n’obwetwaze: okulaga obwetwaze mu ngeri gy’ayambalamu. Nga twekenneereza ku mbeera ya Paz, kiki ku bino wammanga, omuyizi ky’alina okukola, ekikwatagana n’okwongera ku nkulaakulana entonotono ey’obwetwaze bwe mu ngeri gy’ayambalamu?
answer_a: Buli nkya muyimbire oluyimba olumuyamba okwambala akakooti ke ak'okufumbira nga mulimu obuyambi okuva mu biwulirwa.
answer_b: Siba ekooti ya muganda wo, oluvannyuma gyambale era ogiyambule ng'oyimba oluyimba.
answer_c: Yambala ekitambaala kye ng'ayimba oluyimba oluwerekera ebikolwa by'omubiri okumujjukiza emitendera gy'alina okugoberera.
answer_d: Yamwambaza ekitambaala kye eky'okufumbira nga muyambibwa obubonero obiwulirwa nga tukozesa enkyukakyuka emusobozesa okukolola obutoni mu ngeri entuufu era nga yeebeesa.

question: Soma embeera eno: Federico mwana muyizi alina emyaka 8, alina obulemu bw’obwongo, era ali mu kibiina kyakusatu. Alowooza ku bintu ebiriwo ddala era omusomesa w’ekibiina amuzuulidde ng’omuyizi alina obwetaavu bw’obuyambi okwewala embeera ez’akabi mu kibiina n’ekisaawe ky’emizannyo. Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, endagiriro ki ku zino wammanga ekutiriza okwekulakulanya kwa Federico?
answer_a: Tegeeza emboozi munda mu nkola ezo ezikwata ku mbeera z'okwekulakulanya.
answer_b: Laga omwoyo gw'okwefaako nga bw'okola ebintu eby'enjawulo, omuyizi alabe eky'okulabirako akiddemu.
answer_d: Tegeka enkola ey’obulijjo ng’oyambibwa ebifaananyi okusobola okukola ebintu eby’okwekulakulanya mu ngeri entongole.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Bwe yatuuka mu ssomero ly'abaana abato, Camila yazuulibwa ng'alina obulemu bw'obwongo, era abakulu mu kibiina basaanidde okukola Pulogulaamu y'Obuyigirize ey'Omuntu kinnoomu okukulaakulanya obukugu obw'okusoma oba obusookerwako mu nkola y'okusoma, okutwalira awamu okulaba n'okwawula ebintu, nga batunuulira ebyo omuyizi byayagalira. Nga basinziira ku nkola y'okusoma ey'ensi yonna, ku bikolwa bino wammanga kiki ekikulaakulanya obukugu bw'okusoma mu mutendera ogwasooka?
answer_a: Tondawo akatabo ko nga kalimu ebigambo ebikulu by'oyize.
answer_b: Gatta ebifaananyi by’abantu be ab’omumaka be abasinga okumpi, okuyita mu mizannyo gy’okujjukira n’eya lotto
answer_c: Kozesa kaadi eziriko ebifaananyi n'ebigambo okukwataganya ekifaananyi n'erinnya ly'omuntu wo ow'oluganda amukwatagana.
answer_d: Tegeera ebigambo eby’amaanyi mu nsi yonna, ng’okozesa amannya g’ab’oluganda lwe ab’oku lusegere ng’ebigambo by’oyiga.

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu kibiina eky’omukaaga, abayizi bakola ku nkola y’okugonjoola ebizibu. Rodrigo, omuyizi alina obulemu ku bwongo, yeetaaga obuyambi okuva bwe kiri nti akyali mu mutendera ogw’okulowooza ku bintu ebiriwo ddala. Mu nkola ez’enjawulo wano wansi, yipi esindikiriza enkola y’okugonjoola ebizibu okuva mu ndabika ey’omugaso ku masomo g’ekibalangulo?
answer_a:
Waano waliwo ekizibu ekirina ebivaamu bibiri oba bisatu eby’enjawulo, omuyizi alina okulonda ekikyamu:

Omuko gw’ekitabo gumu guliko ebigambo 350. Buli lunaku omuyizi asoma emiko 2. Mu nnaku mmeka omuyizi ono mw’amaliriza okusoma ekitabo kyonna ekyalina emiko 21?

A. Ennaku 12
B. Ennaku 30
C. Ennaku 6
answer_b: Zibuizo ezireetawo obuzibu nga tukozesa okubala nga tuwandika wamu n'engeri y'okukozesa akabalizo ng'obuyambi mu kubigonjoola.
answer_c: Ngaasinziira ku busobozi bw’omwana, muwe ebibuuzo eby’omutindo ogw’enjawulo, ng’okozesa ebintu ebikwatika okumuyambako.
answer_d: Kozesa ebiseera bina eby’okugonjoola ebizibu: tegeera ekizibu, teekateeka enteekateeka, gissa mu nkola, era weerabire eky’okugonjoola.

question: Soma embeera eno: Julieta mwana muwala alina emyaka munaana era alina obuzibu mu kusoma nga ali mu kibiina kya 2 ku ssomero eririna enteekateeka y'obuyigirize egattika abantu bonna. Omuyizi ono ayogera ebigambo ebitegeerekeka, anyumirwa okukolagana ne banne, era yeenyigira mu bintu eby'enjawulo. Mu kibiina ky'essomo ly'ebitonde, abayizi bagenda kukola emmere nga bakozesa enva endiirwa ez'omu nnimiro yaabwe, emmere egenda kufumbibwa era oluvannyuma eteekebwe ku mukutu gwa yintaneeti ogw'essomero. Ku nkyukakyuka zino wammanga ez'eby'enjigiriza, y'erina engeri gy'ekubiriza Julieta okwenyigira mu mulimu guno?
answer_a: Julieta y’akulembera okukwata vidiyo, ng’etabamu mu kintu kino ng’omuteesiteesi.
answer_b: Julieta akola omulimu ogw'engalo ogw'enjawulo ku mutwe ogwateekebwawo, gamba nga lapbook oba mmaanuwa n'aguleeta.
answer_c: Julieta akozesa ebipande ebiriiko ebigambo n'ebifaananyi ebinnyonnyola ky'akola ng'ekigattako.
answer_d: Julieta yakutte vidiyo ng'ali awaka, mw'annyonnyolera ebintu ng'akozesa ebikolwa eby'omubiri obutannge.

question: Soma embeera eno: Jaime muyizi alina obulemu bw’enteekateeka y’obwongo ng’ali mu kibiina kya 5. Omuyizi ono azuula emirimu egitali myangu okutegeera era egyawukana n’obulamu bwe obwa bulijjo nga mizibu. Akabinja k’ekibiina kateekateeka ebikolebwa ku lw’ennaku enkulu ez’eggwanga era kalowooza ku kiruubirirwa ky’okuyiga: Okutegeera engeri ez’enjawulo ez’obusika bw’ennono z’eggwanga n’ebitundu gy’eri. Mu nkola zino wammanga, nki ki ekikwatwako mu ngeri ey’enjawulo ku byetaago bya Jaime okusobola okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa akabinja k’ekibiina kye kateekateeka?
answer_a: Ggoba, mu ngeri ey’eby’enjigiriza, emizannyo egya Chile egya bulijjo okusinziira ku bitundu bya Chile.
answer_b: Teekateeka ennyanjula y'enfumo za Chile ezisinga okumanywa oluvannyuma oziyanjulire ab'omu maka gaabwe
answer_c: Mukolere wamu nga mutegeka ebifo eby'ebyafaayo n'ebijjukizo by'eggwanga lyonna mu bipande.
answer_d: Okutabaala mu kuteekateeka n’oluvannyuma okukola emmere ey’ekinnansi eya bulijjo okuva mu kitundu kyabwe, oluvannyuma ne bagyolesa ku siteendi.

question: Mu nkola zino wammanga, nzi ki egenderera okukulaakulanya obwetwaze n’okwesalirawo mu bikolwa eby’amasanyu eri omuvubuka alina obulemu bw’obwongo?
answer_a: Kubiriza omuvubuka okwetaba mu bintu eby'amasanyu ebikolebwa mu kitundu kyabwe, ng'omulung'amya, era olonde ebitone bye ebisinga obukulu.
answer_b: Kolawo purofayiro y'omuntu omuto, esobozesa omusomesa okumanya omuzannyo ogumusaanira okusinziira ku mbeera ze.
answer_c: Teekateeka enteekateeka etambulira ku muntu ng’okozesa akabinja ke akakuyambako okukyuka, ekisobozesa akabinja akakuyambako okutegeera ebintu omuvubuka by’ayagala okukola.
answer_d: Kola olukalala lw'eby'amasanyu omuto by'ayinza okukola mu maka ge n'omukwano gwe, okumusobozesa okuba n'ennyanguyirizi, okulonda ky'asinga okwagala.

question: Mu ssomero eririna enteekateeka ey’okugattika abayizi abaliko obulemu, abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw’olubereberye baasangiddwa nga bakola ku nkolagana wakati w’amakulu g’ebigambo nga bayita mu bikolwa mwe balondoola ebigambo ebitegeeza ebintu ebyawukana (antonymy) n’ebigambo ebifaanagana amakulu (synonymy). Gloria muyizi alina obusobozi obwa waggulu era alina ekizibu kya Autism Spectrum Disorder era nga y’omu ku bayizi b’ekibiina kino. Amanya ebifaananyi n’ebigambo ebikwata ku mbeera gy’alimu, olulimi lwe olw’okwogera lwa kuddamu bigambo byokka, era yeetaaga obulagirizi obutereevu. Akakiiko k’eby’enjigiriza kasazeewo okumuteerawo enteekateeka y’omusomo egwayiye (Individualised Education Plan) kubanga alina obuzibu mu kutegeera ebikolebwa. Okusinziira ku mbeera ya Gloria, nkola ki etuukirawo gy’ayinza okukozesa okutuuka ku kiruubirirwa ekiteereddwawo?
answer_a:
**Ebibuuzo:**

1.  Lina erinnya ly’ekintu kino. (What is the name of this?)
2.  Kintu ki kino? (What is this?)
3.  Biki ebimu ku bintu ebikulu ebikola ekintu kino? (What are some of the main parts of this?)
4.  Kola ki? (What does it do?)
5.  Kintu ki ekifaanagana n’ekyo? (What is something similar to this?)
6.  Kintu ki ekitali kye kye kimu n’ekyo? (What is something different from this?)
7.  Tuyinza kukozesa wa ekintu kino? (Where can we use this?)
8.  Kintu ki ekikolebwa mu kintu kino? (What is this made of?)
9.  Biki ebimu ku birala ebiri mu kiti kye kimu n’ekyo? (What are some other things in the same category as this?)
10. Kikula ki? (What shape is it?)
answer_b: Laga ebifaananyi ebinene eri abayizi bonna, ebyongera ku bwangu bwa Gloria okutegeera, wamu n'ensonga ezigenda okukubwako omutwe.
answer_c: Okuyita mu bikwata ebiwandiiko, kola okulonda amakulu ge gamu n'amakulu agawukana mu ngeri enkyukakyuka ku lubaawo, ng'ogumya enkolagana y'abantu mu banno.
answer_d: Laga omwana ekifaananyi ky’ekintu ekimanyiddwa ku kibaawo ekikwatagana n’ebintu ebikwatagana, omubuulize erinnya ly’ekintu ekyo, oluvannyuma omusomesa ayogera ekigambo, ate Gloria akimanye.

question: Soma embeera eno: Karina mwana muwalanwa mu mwaka ogw’okuna mu siniya eyakulira ng’alina obulwadde bw’amaaso obuyitibwa myopia okuva mu mwaka ogw’okutaano, ng’amaaso ge galaba 20/400 ku kipimo kya Snellen. Akwatagana bulungi ne banno, era abeesiga. Yeekolera ebintu bye ku bubwe era asaba obuyambi bwe abeera abwetaaze. Okusinziira ku mbeera eno n’endaba ennyingi, kiki ekivaamu okuba nti Karina alina obulwadde buno ku ngeri gy’asaanidde okufuna obuyambi obw’enjawulo?
answer_a: Maneeka alina okwongera amaanyi mu nkozesa ye y'enkola ya braille okusobola okutambuza emirimu gye egy'essomero.
answer_b: Muteekwa okutandika okuyiga Enkola za Hoover okusobola okutambula yekka nga tamuyambye.
answer_c: Yetaaga okukozesa empandiika ennene, akatebe akasimbibwaamu ebiwandiiko, n'emirongo gy'ebigambo egyawuddwaamu bulungi mu mirimu gye egy'essomero.
answer_d: Alina okutandika okuyiga ebikozesebwa eby'ekikugu eby'obuyambi okwongera ku ngeri z'okwogera n'abalala.

question: Soma embeera eno: Omukulu w’ekibiina eky’okutaano mu ssomero eririna enteekateeka y’obuyigirize obugattika ayagala okwongera ku mikwano mu kibiina kye. Mu bayizi be mulimu Raol, alina obuzibu bw’obutalaba bwe yazaalibwa nabwo. Nga tannateekateeka ngeri yonna, omusomesa asaba abayizi b’omu kibiina okuddamu ekibuuzo kino: mpulira ntya nga ndi n’abayizi bannange? Raol addamu: “Siwulira bulungi mu kibiina, walala nnyo. Simanyi ani ayogera nange, bakikola mangu nnyo era kinzibuwalira okubategeera. Mpulira ndi nzekka.” Mu ngeri zino wammanga, ngeri ki eyongera ku mikwano mu kibiina kino n’okugattika Raol?
answer_a: Ku lunaku lw'okulambula, mulage ekibiina obujulizi okuva eri abantu abaliko obulemu.
answer_b: Kuba mizannyo gy'okuzannya ebifo by'abantu abalala mu kibiina, ng'olaga engeri abayizi gye balina okukolaganamu.
answer_c: Buuza abayizi bonna mu kibiina okwogera mu bumu bwabwe engeri gye bawuliramu nga bali mu kibiina.
answer_d: Teekateeka emizannyo egikyusiddwa mu kiseera ky'okuwummula wonna abayizi bonna mu kibiina mwe basobola okwetaba.

question: Soma embeera eno: Maria Ignacia mwana mu kibiina kya 5 ku ssomero eririna enteekateeka y’okugattika abalema n’abatali balema. Ye mulenzi omuzibe w’amaaso olw’obulwadde bwa retinitis pigmentosa obumukutte ennyo. Mu by’emmeeme n’embeera z’abantu, alaga obukugu obumala mu kwegattika ne banno. Akabinja k’omu kibiina, mu somo ly’Olulimi n’Obuwandiisi, bagenda kukebera ekigendererwa ky’okuyiga kino: “Okuwandiika emboozi mu ngeri entangaavu, eyobuyiiya, era nga ya mbagirawo.” Okutuukiriza kino, omusomesa omukugu mu by’enjigiriza y’abalema akikkaatiriza obwetaavu bw’okukola enkyukakyuka ezisobozesa Maria Ignacia okwenyigira. Nga tweyambisa embeera waggulu, nkyukakyuka ki ku zino esinga okuba entuufu okukebera obukugu bwa Maria Ignacia mu by’ayize?
answer_a: Kola n'omuyizi munno akuyambako.
answer_b: Kubunyisa ebyafaayo bye mu nnukuta enzikubaze (braille)
answer_c: Muwandiike olubala lwe ku lwatu.
answer_d: Maliriza omulondo omutendesi gw'aleetawo.

question: Soma embeera eno: Roberto muyizi muzzibe atannabaakwatamu lukung'aana lw'okufumba. Okufumba kumusanyusizza nnyo, era ayagala okukolera mu kisaawe kino. Wabula, yeewulira nga talina bumalirivu ku busobozi bwe okukozesa ebikozesebwa ebiwawa, ekimuleetera okusoomoozebwa mu kuyiga kwe. Omusomesa omukugu ow'abayizi abalina obulemu mu lukung'aana ataddewo ekigendererwa kino: Okuyiga obukodyo obw'okukuuma obulamu nga batema era nga bakwata emmere okusobola okufumba ku bwabwe nga tebatuusa bulabe bwonna. Kino kimanyiddwa nti alina okukwatagana n'okuddamu ebyetaago bya Roberto eby'obuyambi. Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, nkola ki esinga okuba entuufu okukwatagana n'ekigendererwa ekyateesebwa?
answer_a: Kozesa omutendera gwa mukono ku mukono okusala enva endiirwa, ng'ogoberera ebiragiro ebiri mu kunoonyereza kw'omulimu.
answer_b: Kozesa ekikuumi ky'engalo, nga waliwo n'ebiragiro, wansi w'okwekenneenya omulimu okusala enva n'ebibala ku kaati akasalirwako.
answer_c: Goberera ebiragiro eby'omumwa okuva eri omusomesa okubala n'okutema enva endiirwa nga tokosezzaako kaadi yonna, okuyita mu kumanya enjawulo nga okukozesa obukakamu.
answer_d: Kozesa obutundutundu obutono obwa siliikooni oba ffoamu ya labba okukola akabonero we ekiso we kitandikira, oluvannyuma osale emmere ku kaatiingiboodi.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Fernanda ali mu kibiina ekisooka mu ssomero eririna obwetaavu obw’enjawulo mu by’enjigiriza. Okukebererwa kw’amaaso kwekwamukolebwa kulaga nti alina obulwadde bwa retinitis pigmentosa era nga mu kiseera kino, alina obulaba obutono, ng’akyalina obulaba obwa wakati obumala. Mwana muyizi anyiikivu nnyo mu by’okusoma era muyingidde bulungi mu kibiina kye. Omwaka oguwedde, yayize ennukuta n’ebigambo bingi mu kkindagaateni. Akakiiko k’ekibiina kasaanidde okusalawo ku nkola ez’okwanguya ebinaateekebwawo okukyusa ebikozesebwa mu kusoma. Nga tweyambisa ebyo waggulu, enkyukakyuka ki ku zino ezisaanidde okukolebwa okusobola okuyamba Fernanda okufuna ebikozesebwa mu kusoma?
answer_a: Okusoma n'okuwandiika nga okukozesa empandiika ennene
answer_b: Okusoma n'okuwandiika nga tukozesa enkola ya Braille.
answer_c: Okusoma n'okuwandiika n'ennukuta eziri mu bunene obwa bulijjo oba obutono.
answer_d: Okusoma n'okuwandiika Olubalaaya ku kkayiso akasimbye n'akagattako akatabo akanene akandikiddwamu empandiika ennene

question: Soma embeera eno: Sergio alina emyaka kkumi na mukaaga era ali mu mwaka ogwokusatu mu ssomero ly'ebyemikono erisomesa eby'obulimi. Yaziba emyaka egiyise olw'obubenje obwatuuka ku maaso ge. Enkola y'okumuddamu amaanyi ebaddewo enzibu, mu by'omwoyo ne mu ngeri gy'atambuliramu. Akakiiko k'omu ক্লাসে kanoonyereza ku byuma ebisinga okumuyamba okusobola okumuwa obuwagizi obusinga obulungi mu kusoma kwe, okuva omwaka guno lwe yatandise okusoma, nga kigambibwa nti omuyizi ono tabaddeko nnyo beesigwa mu kusoma na kuwandiika mu byafaayo by'essomero lye. Nga twejjukanya embeera ya Sergio, byuma ki ku bino wammanga ebisinga okuba ebyetaagisa okusobola okukulaakulanya ennyo okusoma kwe mu kiseera kino?
answer_a: Essimu (y'omukono) erina Voice Over ne SIRI
answer_b: Ekikulizo ky'ekifaananyi n'enkola ya OCR
answer_c: Omusomi gw'ekkompyuta JAWS n'ekyokulagisa eky'Obuleeyi
answer_d: Omusomi w'ekkompyuta NVDA ne makine ya Perkins

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu mwaka ogw'okubiri ogw'essomero eris серед, omusomesa w'ekibalangulo akola ku kiruubirirwa kino: Okunnyonnyola amawulire agaaweebwa okusiiga ebifaananyi by'emikolo. Okukulaakulanya ekiruubirirwa kino, omusomesa agamba okukozesa programu ez'enjawulo eza kompyuta. Mu bayizi abali mu kibiina, mulimu Felipe, omuzibe era afuna obuyambi obumwanguyiza ebintu. Nga tulowooza ku ebyo waggulu, ku bintu bino wammanga kiki ekisinga okusaana okukozesebwa ne Felipe ku kiruubirirwa ekyateesebwa?
answer_a: Kozesa Braille
answer_b: Kozesa pulogulaamu ya JAWS
answer_c: Nkozesa software ya EDICO
answer_d: Nkozesa enkola eyanguya ebintu eri abantu bonna.

question: Soma embeera eno: Matiyasi muyizi alina obulemu bw’amaaso obw’amaanyi era ali mu mwaka ogw’omwaka ogusooka ogw’ekisulo. Alaga obukugu mu birowoozo obumugwanira. Afuna obukugu mu ICT ne koodi ya braille, mu kusoma kwe n’okuwandiika. Mu kibiina ky’olulimi n’obuwangwa, ttiimu y’ekibiina ekola omulimu ogugenderera ku kiruubirirwa kino: Okukozesa obukugu obw’okuwandiika obwafunibwa mu ngeri ennyangu era ey’obuyiiya ng’engeri y’okwogera ku bubwo era nga bw’oyolekera ebika empya, okunoonyereza ku ngeri z’ekika kino nga tonnawandiika. Okusinziira ku ngeri za Matiyasi, nkola ki ey’okusoma n’okuwandiika esinga okumugwanira okukola omulimu guno?
answer_a: Ebiwandiiko bya braille n’okuwandiika okukubiddwa mu nnukuta ennene
answer_b: Ebipande ebinene n'okuwandiika mu Braille
answer_c: Ebyawandiikibwa ebikozesa enkola ey'okuwulira n'okuwandiika mu Braille
answer_d: Ebyawandiikibwa ebikozesa ekikuza ky'ekifaananyi era n'okuwandiika mu nnukuta empata

question: Soma embeera eno: Rodrigo, omuyizi omuzibe okuva bwe yazaalibwa, ng’alaba ebintu ebikwata oba ebinene ebiri okumpi naye, ayingira essomero ly’abaana abato eririna enteekateeka y’okugattika abalema n’abatali balema, era ng’afuna omukisa okusoma omulundi ogusooka. Abasomesa be bakizuula nti omuyizi alina okukulaakulana kw’amannya kw’ebintu okutali ku mutindo ogw’emyaka gye. Nga tweyambisa embeera eno n’obulwadde bwa Rodrigo, bubonero ki obw’okusomesa obusinga okumuyamba n’abayizi abalala bonna okutuuka ku mutindo ogw’okukulaakulana kw’amannya kw’ebintu ogw’ekibinja kyabwe?
answer_a: Abaana banyumya emboozi ez'enjawulo nga bakola mizannyo mu bibinja.
answer_b: Abaana bazannya okusobola okunnyonnyola n'okuzuula ebigambo ebipya okuva mu ngero.
answer_c: Abaana bakebera ebintu ebikwatika, obutindo, okubumba n'okuwa endowooza ku ngeri zaabyo.
answer_d: Abaana batambula okugenda mu bifo by'omukitundu, nga bakebera ebintu ebipya nga bakozesa okukwatako.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Carmen mwana muyizi alina emyaka munaana nga ali mu kibiina kya 2 mu ssomero eririna enteekateeka y’okugattika abalema n’abatali balema. Ayoleka obunyiivu n’obwetaba mu bintu. Yaziba olw’ekirwadde kya retinoblastoma. Mu somo ly’Ekibalangulo, akola okugatta n’okwawuza okutuuka ku namba ataano, ng’akozesa abakasi n’ennukuta za Braille ez’emirongo ebiri. Ttiimu y’omu kibiina ekimulabirira ekizudde nti akyali ku mutendera gw’okulowooza ku bintu ebirabika era kimuzibuwalira okutegeera engeri ennamba gye zikyukaamu (ennene, entono, yenkanankana, olukalala lw’ennamba, n’ebirala). Okusobola okuyamba Carmen okutegeera ebintu by’ekibalangulo ebitali bya bulijjo n’okukakasa nti yetaba mu bintu mu ngeri y’emu mu kufuna okumanya okujja, ttiimu etegeka okukolera awamu naye ku kiruubirirwa kino: Okunnyonnyola embeera eziva mu bulamu obwa bulijjo ng’okozesa olulimi lw’ekibalangulo ate nga kunoonyereza ku kukuumirawo omuwendo. Mu ngeri zino wammanga, ngeri ki esinga okuyamba Carmen okutuuka ku lulimi lw’ekibalangulo?
answer_a: Pima emigwa gyombi empanvu ze zifaanagana. Giteeke mu layini, omugwa gumu wansi w'omulala. Geraageranya n'omuyizi era osale omusango nti gipima kye kimu. Oluvannyuma teeka omugwa ogumu mu kifaananyi kya sikweya n'omulala mu layini ennyonjo. Buuza omugwa ki ogupima ebisingawo. Kola enkyukakyuka ez'enjawulo era obuuze nate. Pima eky'okuddamu ekituufu.
answer_b: Gerageranya ebibinja bibiri eby'obubonero kkumi kkumi. Biteeke mu layini, ekimu waggulu w'ekirala, obale wamu n'omuyizi, era osalewo nti waliwo omuwendo gwe gumu. Oluvannyuma lekawo ebbanga erisingawo wakati w'obubonero obuli wansi, leka omuyizi abale era alage we wali obubonero obusingawo. Tegeka obubonero mu ngeri ez'enjawulo. Pima eky'okuddamu ekikyamu.
answer_c: Jjuza ebikopo bibiri ebifaanagana n’amazzi agenkana. Kekereza omuyizi nti amazzi genkana. Oluvannyuma leeta ekikopo ekinene n’ekitono, ng’okozesa omukono okukakasa, yiwa amazzi mu bikopo byombi n’emikono gyombi mu kiseera kye kimu. Buuza waali waliyo amazzi amangi. Pima okuzuula eky’okuddamu ekituufu.
answer_d: Kozesa kyuubu ennene mukaaga ne ntono kkumi na bbiri, nga zijjula ekifo kye kimu. Teeka, wamu n'omuyizi, obukyuubu obutono waggulu ku bunene. Noonyereza ebifo we bazimba nabyo nga muli naye. Oluvannyuma yawula obukyuubu okusinziira ku bunene bwabwo, oluvannyuma obuuze: "Obukyuubu bwombi buli..."

question: Soma embeera eno: Francisco yazaalibwa nga tazira ddala era ali mu kibiina kya mukaaga ku ssomero eririna obuyambi obw’enjawulo. Ebimukwatira ku by’okusoma, bw’obigeraageranya ne banne, biri wakati. Ayagala nnyo okuzannya n’okwogera n’emikwano gye. Ttiimu y’ekibiina, mu somo ly’Olulimi n’Empuliziganya, esazeewo okukolera ku kiruubirirwa kino: Okunoonya n’okugeraageranya amawulire ku mutwe gw’ekigambo, nga bakozesa ebintu nga yintaneeti, ebitabo ebinnyonnyola amakulu g’ebigambo, ebitabo, amawulire, n’ebirala, okukola omulimu gw’okunoonyereza. Okukola kino, bategekedde olugendo olw’okusomesa ku laibulale y’omu kitundu. Nkola ki esinga okwongera ku kwetaba kwa Francisco n’obwetwaze mu mulimu guno?
answer_a: Muwewe omuyizi omukulu.
answer_b: Leeeta ebitundu by'ebyawandiikidwa mu Braille
answer_c: Kulembera okusoma okugattira awamu ku mutendera gw'ekibiina.
answer_d: Muteeke abayizi mu bibinja okusinziira ku ngeri gye bakolamu emirimu gyabwe nga bali wamu.

question: Soma embeera eno: Damian mwana muyizi omuzungu era ali mu kibiina kya munaana. Ayiga okukozesa ICTs n’enkola ya braille okusoma n’okuwandiika. Ttiimu y’omu classroom ekiraba nti alina obuzibu mu kutandikawo emikwano n’abayizi banne. Omusomesa w’essomo lya Natural Sciences asazeewo okukola ku kiruubirirwa kino: Okukozesa olukalala lwa periodic table ng’ekyokulabirako okubala ebintu ebikolebwa ebiri mu chemical elements nga basinziira ku ndabika y’obutoffaali bwabyo. Okukola kino, alina okuteekateeka enteekateeka erowooza ku mbeera ya Damian. Mu nkola zino wammanga, y’erina obusobozi okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa kya Damian?
answer_a: Ndiwandiika olukalala lwa Mendeleevu olw'empalirizo mu nnukuta ennneezesa olusobola okuyamba Damian okufuna amawulire agikumagiko.
answer_c: Wa Dami­an kompyuta erina ekikozeso ekiyamba abatalaba okulaba ebiri ku screen, era nga erina ebintu ebikwata ku ebyo bye tugenda okusoma.

question: Soma embeera eno: Maria Luisa ali mu kibiina kya 4 mu ssomero eririna enteekateeka y'obuyigirize egattika abantu bonna. Alina obulemu ku maaso olw'okuzuulibwa ng'alina endwadde ya aniridia ne horizontal bilateral nystagmus. Mu kibiina ky'Ebyafaayo, Geography, n'Ebyobufuzi, akabinja k'abayigiriza kagenda kukolera ku kiruubirirwa kino: Geraageranya engeri ebintu ebirabika n'ebya butonde (nga ensozi, emigga, enkoola, amabeere g'ennyanja, obudde, n'ebirala) bwe biri mu bifo eby'enjawulo mu kitundu ky'ewaabwe. Okukola kino, akabinja k'abayigiriza keetaaga okuteekateeka enkola eneeyamba Maria Luisa okwenyigira. Nkola ki eyanguya okwenyigira kwa Maria Luisa n'okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa?
answer_a: Laga, okuyita mu by'okumuwulira, ebika by'obuyitiro bw'ettaka eby'enjawulo.
answer_b: Teeka ebifaananyi ebiraga ebika by'enkula y'ettaka eby'enjawulo nga byeyambisiddwa ebintu ebikwatika
answer_c: Kola kaadi ezirambika ezannyonnyola buli kika kya ndabika y'ensi.
answer_d: Zimba omulengo ogulina obubonero obukwatika ogukozesa ebika by'enkula y'ettaka eby'enjawulo.

question: Omukutu gwe kikozesezza gutya gukubiriza okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky’okuyiga ekiteereddwaawo ne Martina n’ekibiina kye?
answer_a: Kiyamba abayizi okufuna amawulire mu ngeri endala, omuli okuwulira, okulaba amawulire n'okugattika byombi.
answer_b: Kiyamba abayizi okuba n'obwetongole, nga kiyita mu nkyukakyuka mu nteekateeka y'ebiseera oba obudde obutegekebwa okukola amasomo oba okukebera.
answer_c: Kiyamba abayizi okuba n’obwetongole mu ngeri gye bakolamu, nga bayita mu nkyukakyuka mu bifo, ebifo we bakolera, n’embeera omukolo, omulimu, oba okukebera gye bikolebwamu.
answer_d: Kiyamba abayizi okukola emirimu, ebikolwa, n'okukeberwa nga bayita mu ngeri ez'enjawulo n'ebyuma oba obuyambi obw'ekikugu n'obwa tekinologiya obwategekebwa mu ngeri ennung'amu.

question: Ekibiina ky’ekibiina ky’abayizi kiri mu kumaliriza okukebera Maria, omu ku bayizi baabwe alina obulemu obw’enjawulo, okumanya ebimwetaagisa byonna. Okutuusa kati, balina amawulire gano: okutunuulira obutereevu empisa ze n’engeri gy’akolamu ebintu mu kibiina, okwogera n’ab’omu maka ge, n’okwekenneenya lipooti z’abakugu abalala. Okusinziira ku mbeera eriwo, kika kya kukebera ki ekyetaagisa okuteekateeka Enteekateeka ya Maria ey’Obuyambi bw’Omuntu kinnoomu?
answer_a: Okukebera okw'ekikugu ky'obwongo
answer_b: Okukulaakulana kw'ebikolwa eby'omubiri: Okwekebeza
answer_c: Okwekebejja okw'enfundiiza n'okw'obukenkufu bw'endabantu mu by'enjigiriza
answer_d: Okukebera obukugu bw'okuwulira n'okulaba

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Emilio mwana wa kibiina kya bubiri alina obuzibu obutabangavu mu lulimi. Lw’obuzibu bw’alina mu bigambo ebitali bya bulijjo n’ennimi ez’ekifaananyi, yaweebwa omuyambi okumuwagira n’okunnyonnyola ebintu by’ataategeera. Ng’omuyambi amuyambye, Emilio asobola okumaliriza emirimu era n’okuddamu mu budde obuteereddwawo, newankubadde ng’asinga kutwala obudde obuwanvu okumaliriza. Okusinziira ku nkyukakyuka eziriwo mu ngeri omwana gy’akolamu, kiki ekyamulemesa okwetaba n’okuyiga?
answer_a: Zzaamu ebiragiro eri omuyizi mu ngeri emu yokka.
answer_b: Laga omuwendo gwa x mu kyenkanyanjuyi eno: 3x + 5 = 14. Era oluvannyuma lw'okuzuula omuwendo gwa x, kakasa nti omuwendo ogwo gukola omukutu ogutuufu nga okuteeka omuwendo gwa x mu kyenkanyanjuyi ekyo.
answer_c: Salawo ebbanga ddala erigumala okumaliriza omulimu ogutegekeddwa.
answer_d: Muwe omuyizi omukisa gumu gwokka okulaga by'ayize.

question: Soma embeera eno: Amalia mwana muwere ow’emyaka ena, alina ekizibu ky’obulemu bw’olulimi olw’okwogera, era asomera mu ssomero ly’abaana abato ery’olulimi. Omusomesa we alaga nti ayagala nnyo okwetaba mu kibiina; wabula, mu nkulaakulana y’olulimi lwe, kirabika nti tasobola kwetegereza byetaago by’oyo gw’ayogera naye era tassaamu kitiibwa ku nkyukakyuka mu kibuuzo n’okuddamu. Ate era, bw’ayogera, aleka ennukuta /r/ mu kigambo, tamenyerawo biti bya makulu era tannayogera sentensi eziragira n’ez’obukakafu. Nga tutunuulidde emyaka gya Amalia, mu mutendera gw’olulimi ki obuyambi bwe bweetaagisa mwe bulabikira?
answer_a: Amakulu g'ebigambo
answer_b: Eby'amaloboozi
answer_c: Ekikolwa ekigendereddwa
answer_d: Enkola y'ebigambo n'engeri gye bikolamu sentensi

question: Soma embeera eno: Omusomesa w’abaana abato mu ssomero ly’ennimi akiraba nti abamu ku bayizi be beetaaga obuyambi mu mirimu gy’olulimi egizibu, gamba nga okwogera ku kifo ekintu we kiri okukigerageranya n’ekintu ekirala n’okuwa amawulire agalaga obwolekero. N’olwekyo, asalawo okukola okunoonyereza okukwata ku ndowooza y’omwana n’ebimuyamba okusoma. Nga tweyambisa embeera eno, ku nkola zino wammanga ez’okwekebejja y’erina engeri y’okuweereza amawulire agakwata ku byetaago by’abayizi eby’obuyambi?
answer_a: Kozesa akakodyo akapima okutegeera kw'omuntu ku bintu eby'obudde.
answer_b: Kola akagezi okukebera okutegeera n’okunnyonnyola ebikolwa ebiraga ekifo omuntu oba ekintu we kiri.
answer_c: Kozesa akakodyo k'okwetegereza okukebera engeri emboozi gy'ezimbibwamu.
answer_d: Kola olukalala lw'ebyo by'olina okwekebejja okusobola okwetegereza obulungi enkozesa y'ekigambululo ekikolerwako mu sentensi.

question: Soma embeera eno: Gabriela mwana waakusatu mu ssomero eririna ekitongole ekikwasaganya abayizi abalina obulemu obw’enjawulo, era alina obuzibu mu bigambo by’akozesa. Abasomesa be bakizudde nti bw’aba mu bibinja ng’ayogera, by’ayogera tebikwatagana n’omutwe gw’ensonga era omuntu gw’ayogera naye bw’amusaba okwongera okunnyonnyola, alekera awo okwogera nga tamuddangamu. N’olwekyo, basabye abakugu mu by’obulemu okumukebera. Mu nkola zino ez’okukebera, y’ennu ebasobozesa okukung’aanya amawulire agakwata ku byetaago by’omuyizi ono?
answer_a: Teeka mu lukalala okutegeera olulimi olw'ekifaananyi mu mbeera z'abantu.
answer_b: Kozesa enkola ennyonnyofu ey'obukugu ekolebwamu mu kwogera.
answer_c: Kola olukalala lw'empisa ezeeyolekedde mu kwegattako ng'okozesa ekipimo ky'okusiima.
answer_d: Ekoloboza erinnyonnyola enkozesa y'emboozi ezirimu sentensi enzibuwavu mu lulimi olw'obuntu.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Bw’oba ng’okebera omuyizi alina emyaka ena n’emyezi ekkumi, omusawo omukugu mu by’okwogera mu ssomero akizuula nti omuyizi talina nnukuta /m/ mu by’ayogera era nga abulako obubonero -2 SD mu bigambo by’akozesa mu kigezo kya TECAL. Ate era, omusomesa omukugu mu by’enjigiriza ey’enjawulo akizuula nti sentensi z’omuyizi tezirina mutindo, wabula ebyo by’ayogera birambulukuka. N’olwekyo, abakulu b’ekibiina basisinkana okusalawo mu kifo ki omuyizi mw’anaatandikira okufuna obuyambi okukulaakulanya olulimi lwe? Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, mu kifo ki obuyambi mwe bulina okutandikira okusobola okuyamba omuyizi okukulaakulanya olulimi lwe?
answer_a: Okusomola amakulu g'ebigambo
answer_b: Okutegeera engeri ebigambo gye bivuga
answer_c: Okutegeeza ennyingo z'ebigambo
answer_d: Okutegeka sentensi

question: Soma embeera eno: Daniel muyizi mu ssomero ly'abaana abato, alina ekizibu ky'olulimi olutabuddemu, era ng'asomera mu ssomero ly'olulimi. Omusomesa we amulabye ng'ayagala obuyambi okukozesa ennyingo ennambulukufu mu kigambululo ky'erinnya, kubanga akola ensobi mu kukwataganya ebigambo. Embeera eno ekosa enkolagana ye n'abantu abakulu n'abayizi banne, kubanga kizibu okwewulira. Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, mulimu ki ogugonjoola obwetaavu bw'omuyizi ono?
answer_a: Laba era onnyonnyole ebifaananyi, ng'olaga ekikolwa omuntu mu kifaananyi ky'akola.
answer_b: Wuliriza era ogondere ebiragiro ebiteereke mu mizannyo gy'ekibiina egikozesa ebitundu by'omubiri.
answer_c: Tegeera era otuume ebikolwa ebyakolebwa abeenyigiddwa ab'enjawulo mu kuzannya omuzannyo ogw'okukoppa.
answer_d: Longoose n'ogatte akabonero ku linnya eriri obumu oba obungi mu sentensi eziweereddwa, nga bwekyetaagisa.

question: Mu mbeera y’okukyala mu myuziyamu, ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, gwe guwa abayizi abalina obulemu bw’ennimi obw’enjawulo omukisa okukulaakulanya omulimu gw’olulimi ogw’obuntu?
answer_a: Tegeka omwoleso omukulu abayizi mwe balangulira emirimu n’obulamu bw’omukubi w’emifaananyi omwatiikirivu mu kiseera eky’omwoleso.
answer_b: Teekateeka omuzannyo 'Omulimu gwange ogw'omutima' abayizi mwe balondoola omulimu gwe balabye ne boogera ku nneewulira gye gubaleetera.
answer_c: Teesa omuzannyo 'olugendo olw'ekirowoozo' abayizi mwe bayingirira omuwandiiko mu ndowooza oluvannyuma ne bannyonnyola olugendo lwabwe.
answer_d: Teekawo ebifo eby’emboozi omuli abayizi mwe basobola okubuuliza omukulembeze w’ettendekero ly’ebyamazina ebibuuzo nga: Ani omukugu eyakozesezza ebintu bino? Nkola ki gye yakozesezza mu mulimu gwe?

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu kibiina ekisooka mu ssomero eririna abaana abetaaga obuyambi obw’enjawulo mu by’enjigiriza, abamu ku bayizi bawandiika nga bakozesa akagaali. Olw’ensonga eno, omusomesa akola omulimu ogw’okubasaba okumanya omuwendo gw’ebigambo ebiri mu buli sentensi, oluvannyuma lw’okubasomera sentensi ez’obuwanvu obw’enjawulo. Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, nsonga ki lwaki omulimu ogwo gwateereddwamu?
answer_a: Okukulaakulanya okumanya ebigambo mu sentensi
answer_b: Okutegeera engeri sentensi empanvu gye zitegekeddwamu
answer_c: Okwongera okutegeera ebiri mu sentensi nga ozisoma
answer_d: Okutegeera amakulu g'obukolwa bw'obutundutundu bw'ennimi mu sentensi

question: Ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, kiki ekikubiriza okwefumiitiriza mu bayizi abalina obulemu bw’ennimi nga bakola omulimu ogw’obukulembezze obwa demokulasiya: okulonda omukulu w’ebintu by’ekibiina?
answer_a: Kuba olukung'aana ku bukulembeze obulungi abayizi mwe baddamu ebibuuzo nga: Bakulembeze ki be mumanyi?
answer_b: Tegeka omukolo ogw'okubuuza omuyizi eyawangudde ebibuuzo, gamba nga: Omulimu gwo ogw'okuwangula gutandika ddi?
answer_c: Kuba olukung'aana n'akakiiko k'essomero abayizi mwe bawa lipooti ku kulonda era baddemu ebibuuzo nga: Bayizi bameka abaakalonda?
answer_d: Tegeka olukung'aana olw'ebyokulonda abayizi mwe banaakubaganya ebirowoozo ku bibuuzo nga bino: Ani yawangudde? Kiki ekigendererwa ky'okulonda? Lwaki kikulu?

question: Mu mulamwa gw'ekikolwa ky'okuzimba ettandaazi ly'obutonde, ku bikolwa bino wammanga kiki ekikubiriza okwefumiitiriza mu bayizi oluvannyuma lw'okuzimba kwabwe?
answer_a: Muwe endowooza ku ngeri ekitena eky'obutonde bw'ensi gye kiyinza okukozesebwa.
answer_b: Teeka ebifaananyi mu ngeri entegeke eraga omugendo gw'okuzimba ettanda eya 'ecological'
answer_c: Kola vidiyo ng'olaga engeri ettandaasi ly'ebbulooka ly'obuwangwa bwe likozesebwa nga limaze okukolebwa.
answer_d: Gambuuza ku buzibu n’ebyo bye wayize mu kukola ettandaazi ly’ebitoffaali by’obutonde.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Claudio, omuyizi alina obulemu bw’ennimi obw’enjawulo, asoma mu kibiina kya 3 mu ssomero eririna enteekateeka y’okwegattira awamu. Ttiimu ye ey’omu kibiina eraga nti alaga okukulaakulana okw’amaanyi mu kusoma, naddala mu kubunulula ebigambo. Naye era akyetaaga obuyambi okutegeera ebiwandiike, kubanga alemererwa okuggyamu amawulire ag’omugaso; ng’ekyokulabirako, tasobola kutegeera biragiro ebiwandiike mu kiseera ky’ebigezo. Wadde ng’ekibiina kiteekateeka engeri ez’enjawulo, balaba nga kyetaagisa okukola enkyukakyuka mu programu y’ebisomesebwa nga bakola ebigezo ebiwandiike. Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, nkyukakyuka ki mu programu y’ebisomesebwa ekikwatagana okukolebwa ku muyizi ono?
answer_a: Tegekawo ebifo ebiwummuza emirembe mu biseera by'okusoma
answer_b: Kyusa engeri omuyizi gy’addamuamu ebibuuzo okudda mu ngeri ey’okwogera.
answer_c: Weebwe akadde akawerako mu kukebera ebigezo ebiwandiike.
answer_d: Teeka essira ku birowoozo ebikulu mu nnyanjula y'okukebera.

question: Omulimu ki omulala oguyinza okuyambako ttiimu y'abasomesa okusomesa abayizi abali mu mwaka ogwokusatu abalina obulemu bw'ennimi okutegeera n'okwawula ebikulu ebiri mu biwandiiko ebirimu amawulire?
answer_a: Mukole omulundi ogw’okusoma ebyo mwemwasoma mu kibiina nga mwesigamye ku biwandiiko ebikulu.
answer_b: Yongera ku byo osomye ng'okozesa vidiyo erimu ebimanyiso ebirala.
answer_c: Sigattako omukutu gw'ebigambo ebikulu okuva mu biwandiiko ebikulu okusobola okusoma.
answer_d:
Somo: Okukendeeza

Omutwe omukulu: Okukendeeza

Emitwe emitonotono:
1. Okukendeeza nga okuggyako
2. Okukendeeza ku namba entonotono
3. Okukendeeza ku namba ennene
4. Okukendeeza nga tukozesa olukoloboze lw'ennamba
5. Ebibuuzo by'ebigambo ebikwata ku kukendeeza

Ebibuuzo:

1. Kendeeza 5 ku 8.
2. Kendeeza 3 ku 7.
3. Bw'oba olina ebisooka 10, n'oggyako 4, ofuna ebisooka bimeka?
4. Luyimba alina empapula 12. Bw'awaako muganda we 5, asigaza empapula meka?
5. Kolozesa olukoloboze lw'ennamba okukendeeza 2 ku 9.
6. Kendeeza 15 ku 25.
7. Kendeeza 32 ku 48.
8. Omukozi alina emitwalo 50. Bw'akozesa emitwalo 20, asigaza emitwalo meka?
9. Omulimi yalima emiti 65. Bw'atemako 18, asigaza emiti emeka?
10. Kendeeza 125 ku 200.

Ebiddamu:

1. 3
2. 4
3. 6
4. 7
5. 7
6. 10
7. 16
8. Emitwalo 30
9. 47
10. 75

question: Soma embeera eno: Omusomesa ow’ekibiina ekisooka ategese omulimu ogw’okunnyonnyola omwana gy’alina okwanjula mu bufunze ekifo n’omulimu gw’obutegeevu. Mu kibiina, mulimu abayizi babiri abalina obulemu bw’ennimi obw’enjawulo abalina obuzibu mu kufulumya ebigambo ebyangu, nga batabula ebigambo bibiri oba bisatu. Ku nkyukakyuka zino wammanga ez’eby’okusoma, enkyukakyuka ki etuukirawo okutuukiriza obwetaavu bw’abayizi bano?
answer_a: Ggyawo okunnyonnyola n'okulambulula emirimu gy'obwongo.
answer_b: Okukendeeza oba okwongera ku budde obwateereddwaawo okwanjula amawulire agakwata ku birowoozo.
answer_c: Teeka omulamwa gw'okufaayo ku bitundu by'omubiri ebikozesa obwongo mu kunnyonnyola.
answer_d: Londa amannya g'obutegeevu n'ebifo byabwo mu kunnyonnyola, okwewala okunnyonnyola emirimu gyabwo.

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu kibiina ekisooka mu ssomero eririna enteekateeka y’okugattika abayizi abaliko obulemu, waliwo abayizi babiri abalina obulemu mu kwogera. Bombi balina obwetaavu bw’obuyambi mu kwogera kwabwe, Fernando yeetaaga obuyambi okufuna ebigambo ate Sergio yeetaaga okwewala okuzungulira mu by’ayogera. Mu somo ly’Essomabuzimbe, balina okwanjula mu lwatu ku nsolo, nga boogera ku bintu ng’obunene, ekibikka omubiri, engeri y’okutambula, n’ekifo mw’esula. Ku nkyukakyuka z’enteekateeka y’ebisomesebwa zino wammanga, y’ennuufu okuddamu eri obwetaavu bw’obuyambi bw’abayizi mu mulimu gw’okwanjula mu lwatu?
answer_a: Buuza abayizi ebibuuzo ebikulu okubayamba mu kwanjula kwabwe.
answer_b: Saba omulimu oguwandiike ogukwata ku birimu ebinaakeberwa.
answer_c: Wa ekirowoozo ky'okukozesa ebikolwa by'emikono ng'obuyambi eri olulimi olw'akamwa.
answer_d: Teekawo enkola ekola ku ddoboozi ewandiika ebyo omuntu by'ayogera mu kiseera kye kimu.

question: Soma embeera eno: Felipe mwana muyizi mu kibiina kyakusatu alina obulemu bw’olulimi olw’okwogera. Mu bigezo ebiwandiike, afuna ebyavaamu ebitalaga by’ayize, olw’okuba okuwandiika kwe kugenda mpola era nga tasobola kuddamu mu budde obuteereddwa. N’olwekyo, ttiimu y’ekibiina ekola enkyukakyuka mu nteekateeka y’ebisomesebwa, ng’ekiraga nti omuyizi alina okuddamu ebibuuzo bye mu bigezo nga ayogera. Okusinziira ku ebyo waggulu, kyakulabirako ki ttiimu y’ekibiina ky’ekoze okusobola okukola enkyukakyuka mu nteekateeka y’ebisomesebwa?
answer_a: Okusengeka obudde
answer_b: Enkola y'okuddamu
answer_c: Okutegeka obutonde bw'ensi
answer_d: Ennyanjula y'ebyamawulire

question: Ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, kkiru ki ekisinga okusaana okukozesebwa okukulaakulanya omuyizi mu nteekateeka y'ebigambo mu bulango?
answer_a: Namba ebifaananyi okukola sentensi: Omuwala alya apple
answer_b: Ssaawa ennamba etuukana n'enteekateeka y'omulandira mu butondekero
answer_c:
Omulenzi afuuyira ebikondo by’omuzira ku keeki y’amazaalibwa ga mwannyina.

Omulenzi afuuyira ebikondo by’omuzira ku keeki y’amazaalibwa ga mwannyina.
answer_d: Zuula ebitaliimu nsaatu era obyogereko.

question: Ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, kkiru ki ekikulaakulanya enkola y’ebigambo mu bayizi abalina obulemu bw’ennimi obw’enjawulo?
answer_a: Ggrupinga ebifaananyi ebirimu ekintu oluvannyuma n’olaga enjawulo mu ngeri gye bivuga mu bumu n’obungi.
answer_b: Londa olupapula olulaga ebikolwa eby'enjawulo oluvannyuma onnyonnyole banne bo ebikolwa bye walonze.
answer_c: Wuliriza sentensi era olonde ezo ezirimu obusirusiru mu bigambo, oluvannyuma ozuule sentensi entuufu.
answer_d: Kozesa ebifaananyi okuzimba sentensi ennyangu nga weekenneenya empola empola ebintu eby’ekibalanguzi.

question: Ku ndagaano zino wammanga, engeri ki eraga endowooza y’olulimi okusinziira ku tteeka lya Chomsky?
answer_a: Olulimi lwe luyiteeka ku nddamu ez'omumwa n'enddamu ez'omunda omwana z'ayiga okuyita mu kwemalirira okw'amaanyi.
answer_b: Olulimi lusetendeka lw'ebintu n'amateeka agategeddwa agava mu nkola ezaazaalibwa nazo.
answer_c: Olulimi kiva mu magezi, ekitegeeza nti lukwatagana n’ebiva mu nkulaakulana y’obwongo.
answer_d: Olulimi lwe lukoloboze olukulu oluyitaamu enkola z'okukyusa n'okusaasaanya okumanya mu mbeera ey'omukwanaganyo n'entabaganyi.
